purpose: The email announces two postdoctoral positions available at UCLouvain, Belgium, specifically for candidates with a Ph.D. in computer science who are currently outside Belgium. It highlights the competitive salary, support, and the opportunity to work on the RAINDROP project, which focuses on adapting cloud applications to distributed resources. The positions allow for independent research projects aligned with the candidates' interests, under the mentorship of experienced professors. Interested candidates are encouraged to contact the professors for further discussion and to submit their CV and publication record.
